rooms.description: North-facing entrance with welcoming design incorporating Vastu principles for positive energy flow and auspicious entry.
Spacious living room adjoining the entrance lobby with ample natural light. Designed to maximize airflow and comfort as per local norms.
An integrated dining area adjacent to the living room, designed for family gatherings and social interactions.
Modern kitchen with efficient layout and essential appliances. Designed in accordance with safety norms and functionality.
Small guest bedroom ensuring privacy and comfort, designed for occasional overnight guests.
